name: Blockland of Growth
description:
[Game made for the Kenney Jam 2022 - Theme: Growth]

In this very difficult game, control lil' Kenny using the expandable blocks to get them to the top!

Collect mushrooms along the way to grow and make your life a little bit easier!

ControlsZExpand blue blocksXExpand red blocksCExpand yellow blocksRRestart at the last checkpoint

Credits:

> 2D Assets: Kenney

> Programming: Lucas "Klausbdl" Mattos

> SFX: Kenney

> Menu music: Andrés Vilches Cortés (schophead.itch.io/16-bits-vgm)

> BG sound: "deleted_user_229898" at Freesound.org
